Interface StateChangeEvent

All Known Implementing Classes:
BusinessEditorState, StateApplication
public interface StateChangeEvent
Represents an application event that allows the registration and removal of listeners for state changes. Classes implementing this interface manage state change listeners and notify them when a state change occurs.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deregisterStateListener(StateChangeListener listener)
    Deregister a previously registered listener, removing it from receiving state change notifications.
    void
    registerStateListener(StateChangeListener listener)
    Registers a listener to be notified when a state change occurs.

  • Method Details

    • registerStateListener

      void registerStateListener(StateChangeListener listener)
      Registers a listener to be notified when a state change occurs.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to register

    • deregisterStateListener

      void deregisterStateListener(StateChangeListener listener)
      Deregister a previously registered listener, removing it from receiving state change notifications.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to deregister
